experience.summary: Flexcon-IT / Director AI Strategy June 2025 ‚Äì October 2025 (Vienna, Austria) ‚Äî Designed a cloud-native, multi-tenant AI platform for real-time speech, workflow automation, and conversational AI with ultra-low latency.
evidence: Flexcon-IT / Director AI Strategy June 2025 ‚Äì October 2025 (Vienna, Austria)
Designed a cloud-native, multi-tenant AI platform for real-time speech, workflow automation, and conversational AI with ultra-low latency.
Led the development of a next-generation communication protocol (IICP/SYNAPSE) for distributed AI agent meshes, enabling secure and fault-tolerant orchestration of complex enterprise workflows.
Built containerized production infrastructure using Docker, Kubernetes, and Traefik, with integrated monitoring (Prometheus, Grafana) and workflow automation (n8n).
Defined global SaaS and white-label models for international market expansion.
Managed cross-regional teams across Europe, Asia, and the Americas to deliver enterprise-grade deployments.
Oversaw compliance and zero-trust architecture strategies (GDPR, HIPAA, EU-MDR).
Established strategic partnerships with channel partners, vendors, consultancies, and resellers to accelerate adoption.

Building advanced AI models and orchestrating frameworks with applications in leadership assessment, geopolitical analysis, and cybersecurity across various industries.

Swahili (Basic) Proof of Work Summary Since transitioning from KPMG to leading AI strategy at Flexcon-IT, Roble Mumin has built enterprise-scale AI frameworks that integrate advanced prompt engineering with modular, cloud-native architectures. His initiatives span leadership assessment, cybersecurity, and geopolitical analysis, consistently aligning innovation with regulatory compliance (GDPR, HIPAA, EU-MDR). These efforts have laid the foundation for secure, scalable platforms that bridge academic research, protocol innovation, and enterprise deployment. 2025 Highlights
Capstone v2.0 - Developed a secure, scalable AI telephony and workflow automation platform, enabling seamless speech-to-action pipelines with enterprise-grade compliance.

Medical Imaging Research - Applied transfer learning to capsule endoscopy, reducing training time by 40% while increasing diagnostic precision; integrated Vision Transformers and federated learning for privacy-preserving, regulation-aligned workflows. 2024 Highlights
CLAP (Comprehensive Leadership Assessment Prompt) - Designed an AI-driven framework for leadership evaluation, emphasizing ethics, integrity, and continuous improvement in organizational contexts.
PROGUARD - Created an AI toolkit to identify and analyze propaganda in social media, delivering actionable insights on disinformation and geopolitical influence campaigns.
SherlockGPT - Engineered an investigative AI tool for detecting patterns of misconduct in high-stakes environments, supporting accountability and risk management.

READ (Research, Evaluation, Analysis, Dissemination) - Built a cross-domain analysis system that reconstructs fragmented data into coherent insights, enabling ethical, bias-aware, and culturally contextualized decision-making. Current focus (2025): Advancing secure, scalable, and ethical AI ecosystems at Flexcon-IT by linking research, protocol innovation, and enterprise platforms. Emphasis on delivering measurable progress in leadership intelligence, cybersecurity, and global client engagement with strict GDPR compliance.
CV - Roble Mumin cv@roblemumin.com +49-177-444-88-48
CV December 2025 Page 4/8
